alert.note: Alert for Baxter (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 1:08PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Izard, western Fulton and northeastern Baxter Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 108 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Colfax, or over Mountain Home, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mountain Home... Gassville... Briarcliff... Diamond Bay... Ozark Regional Airport... Fawn Park... Colfax... Gamaliel Landing... Vidette... Elizabeth... Mitchell... Robinson Point Landing... Wild Cherry... Henderson... Gepp... Norfork Lake... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
